message.body: Hey! Are you out about town tonight?
Hey!! I'm at my friend kevans and we are trying to find out if our mutual friend is dating a sociopath
lol by background checking him. Im convinced my friends bf has lied to her about everything about himself
We already caught him in social media lies aka posting pics that are actually from other places not from where he claimed his 'work' was etc
Anyway but yeah we should hang out soon. I'll text when things calm down. My stuff goes up at the last drop in nov and I have like three paintings to finish
So I've been insanely busy etc etc
Sounds good, I really do think your quite an individual and hope to get to know you better.
And I'm making pasta right now
